definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
needlework/working for a living as a needleworker

sentences.english: Without no seams nor needle work.
sentences.chinese: 不用针线就用情意密密缝。

sentences.english: When she sews she makes long stitches.
sentences.chinese: 她做针线活时针脚很大。

sentences.english: Her only resorts when she is alone are sewing and watching TV.
sentences.chinese: 当她单独一人时，唯一可做的事是做针线和看电视。

sentences.english: Having a compassionate heart, he got out a needle and thread and sewed the bean back together.
sentences.chinese: 这位裁缝心肠很好，取出针线把它的肚子缝在了一起。

sentences.english: You know, the ancient Chinese women were supposed to be good at needlework.
sentences.chinese: 知道吗，中国古代女子都得做针线活。

sentences.english: He began to ransack his mother's workbox for a piece of thread.
sentences.chinese: 他要找一根线，开始翻腾哈哈哈针线盒。

sentences.english: She just did needlework and made tea.
sentences.chinese: 她只是做针线活和泡茶。

sentences.english: Sit in at the knitting circle down at the yarn shop.
sentences.chinese: 在纱支小店里围坐一圈做做针线。

sentences.english: Without to seams nor needle work.
sentences.chinese: 上面不要缝口，也不用针线。

sentences.english: Front door, red holds a thread basket son just the heel Cui Ming talk.
sentences.chinese: 大门口，红柳捧着针线篮子正跟翠茗说话。

sentences.english: Without no seams nor needle work, then he'll be a true love of mine.
sentences.chinese: 没有缝口，也不用针线，那么他就会是我的心上人。

sentences.english: Do not needle cross from one area to another area far apart.
sentences.chinese: 切勿将针线从一个区域跨到相隔很远的另一区域。

sentences.english: The lonely patient derives pleasure from sewing.
sentences.chinese: 那个孤独的病人从针线活儿里获得乐趣。

sentences.english: I used to hate sewing before we got a sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 在我们买来缝纫机之前我最恨做针线活。

definition: needlework/working for a living as a needleworker
flying needle and running seam (idiom); skillful needlework
to be skillful with one's hands/to be manually adroit
